verses.verse: For as touching <S%G4012><s%> the ministering <S%G1248><s%> to the saints, <S%G40><s%> it is superfluous <S%G4053><s%> for me to write <S%G1125><s%> to you:

For I know <S%G1492><s%> the forwardness <S%G4288><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> mind, <S%G4288><s%> for which <S%G3739><s%> I boast <S%G2744><s%> of you to them of Macedonia, <S%G3110><s%> that Achaia <S%G882><s%> was ready <S%G3903><s%> a year <S%G4070><s%> ago; <S%G575><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> zeal <S%G2205><s%> has provoked <S%G2042><s%> very <S%G4119><s%> many. <S%G4119><s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> have I sent <S%G3992><s%> the brothers, <S%G80><s%> lest <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> our boasting <S%G2745><s%> of you should be in vain <S%G2761><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> behalf; <S%G3313><s%> that, as I said, <S%G3004><s%> you may be ready: <S%G3903><s%>

Lest <S%G3381><s%> haply <S%G3381><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they of Macedonia <S%G3110><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with me, and find <S%G2147><s%> you unprepared, <S%G532><s%> we (that we say <S%G3004><s%> not, you) should be ashamed <S%G2617><s%> in this <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G5026><s%> confident <S%G5287><s%> boasting. <S%G2746><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> I thought <S%G2233><s%> it necessary <S%G316><s%> to exhort <S%G3870><s%> the brothers, <S%G80><s%> that they would go <S%G4281><s%> before <S%G4281><s%> to you, and make <S%G4294><s%> up beforehand <S%G4293><s%> your bounty, <S%G2129><s%> whereof you had notice <S%G4293><s%> before, that the same <S%G5026><s%> might be ready, <S%G2092><s%> as a matter of bounty, <S%G2129><s%> and not as of covetousness. <S%G4124><s%>

But this <S%G5124><s%> I say, He which sows <S%G4687><s%> sparingly <S%G5340><s%> shall reap <S%G2325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> sparingly; <S%G5340><s%> and he which sows <S%G4687><s%> bountifully <S%G2129><s%> shall reap <S%G2325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> bountifully. <S%G2129><s%>

Every <S%G1538><s%> man according <S%G2531><s%> as he purposes <S%G4255><s%> in his heart, <S%G2588><s%> so let him give; not grudgingly, <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3077><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of necessity: <S%G318><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> a cheerful <S%G2431><s%> giver. <S%G1395><s%>

And God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1415><s%> to make <S%G4052><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> abound <S%G4052><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you; that you, always <S%G3842><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> sufficiency <S%G841><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things, may abound <S%G4052><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work: <S%G2041><s%>

(As it is written, <S%G1125><s%> He has dispersed <S%G4650><s%> abroad; <S%G4650><s%> he has given <S%G1325><s%> to the poor: <S%G3993><s%> his righteousness <S%G1343><s%> remains <S%G3306><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that ministers <S%G2023><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> to the sower <S%G4687><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> minister <S%G5524><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> for your food, <S%G1035><s%> and multiply <S%G4129><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> seed <S%G4703><s%> sown, and increase <S%G837><s%> the fruits <S%G1081><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> righteousness; <S%G1343><s%>)

Being enriched <S%G4148><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> thing to all <S%G3956><s%> bountifulness, <S%G572><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> causes <S%G2716><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> us thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

For the administration <S%G1248><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> service <S%G3009><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> supplies <S%G4322><s%> the want <S%G5303><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> but is abundant <S%G4052><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> by many <S%G4183><s%> thanksgivings <S%G2169><s%> to God; <S%G2316><s%>

Whiles by the experiment <S%G1382><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> ministration <S%G1248><s%> they glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> professed <S%G3671><s%> subjection <S%G5292><s%> to the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and for your <S%G3588><s%> liberal <S%G572><s%> distribution <S%G2842><s%> to them, and to all <S%G3956><s%> men;
And by their prayer <S%G1162><s%> for you, which long <S%G1971><s%> after <S%G1971><s%> you for the exceeding <S%G5235><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in you.
Thanks <S%G5485><s%> be to God <S%G2316><s%> for his unspeakable <S%G411><s%> gift. <S%G1431><s%>
